title: Finding the Determinant
text: The determinant of the matrix is goven by $$a d-b c$$. This means that the determinant is (29).
speech: The determinant of the matrix is goven by , a d minus b c . This means that the determinant is (29).
pacedSpeech: The determinant of the matrix is goven by  , a d minus b c
. This means that the determinant is (29).

title: Multiplying the Determinant with the Changed Matrix
text: We must modify the matrix into the form $$\begin{bmatrix} d & -b \\ -c & a \end{bmatrix}$$. We now have $$\begin{bmatrix} 9 & 2 \\ -1 & 3 \end{bmatrix}$$. We now divide the matrix by $$29$$ to get $$\begin{bmatrix} 9 & 2 \\ -1 & 3 \end{bmatrix}/29$$
speech: We must modify the matrix into the form  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 d, negative b row 2 negative c, a . We now have , the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 9, 2 row 2 negative 1, 3 . We now divide the matrix by  29  to get  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 9, 2 row 2 negative 1, 3 divided by 29
